items.headline: A beginners guide to basic bird care for first time bird owners.
objectives_summary: This course is for first time bird owners who want to learn more about caring for budgies.  Budgies are fascinating pets however they are not as low maintenance as many people assume. This course will help you gain an understanding of their food and nutrition, housing, grooming and basic care needs in addition to their normal and unusual behaviours and how to spot signs of sickness in your pet bird.  Learn about common household hazards that can be toxic. The videos also provide helpful advice on how to maintain a clean and safe environment for birds  and some basic tips on training.
